text: Pietro Perugino (1446–1524) was a leading Italian painter of the Umbrian school. He developed some of the qualities that found classic expression in the High Renaissance. He was born as Pietro Vannucci in Città della Pieve. Perugino also was one of Raphael's teachers. ==Related pages== * Italian Renaissance art * List of Italian painters Category:1446 births Category:1524 deaths Category:15th-century Italian painters
title: Pietro Perugino
